TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ActionBarNavigationMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types.
Docs.remarks:
Enumerates value returned by the following:
.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.App.ActionBarNavigationMode List = int32(1)

summary.para: List navigation mode. Instead of static title text this mode presents a list menu for navigation within the activity. e.g. this might be presented to the user as a dropdown list.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.App.ActionBarNavigationMode Standard = int32(0)

summary.para: Standard navigation mode. Consists of either a logo or icon and title text with an optional subtitle. Clicking any of these elements will dispatch onOptionsItemSelected to the host Activity with a MenuItem with item ID android.R.id.home.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.App.ActionBarNavigationMode Tabs = int32(2)

summary.para: Tab navigation mode. Instead of static title text this mode presents a series of tabs for navigation within the activity.
